## Description {#details}

Helper struct for multiline string block literals.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> this type to preserve newlines in strings.

Definition at line 104 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/remarks/yamlremarkserializer-cpp">YAMLRemarkSerializer.cpp</a>.
